name: Muskel Aktiv
descr:
2-channel electrostimulation appliance with 6 pre-programmed and 6 free programs.

The Muskel Aktiv device is used primarily to treat muscular pain, to eliminate atrophy, to improve muscular strenght and to reduce hypertonic muscles.

The Muskel Aktiv has the following features: editing mode with 6 clients defined programs, locking of the programs enables the therapists to fix the ideal therapy program for the patient, retrievable operating parameters so that the terapists can see if the patient has done the treatment with information regarding operating time, switch on/off cycles and average intensity, intergrated AKS, sequential programs, custom-made graphic display, independent channels.
